buginformation.summary: windows操作系统下复制粘贴配置内容时，如果有空行，会报错
buginformation.description: 如题，我的复制粘贴内容如下 ``` spring.datasource.url = jdbc:mysql://172.16.113.135:3306/sandbox2?characterEncoding=utf8 url = https://${var.env}.xxx.com var.env = dev k2 = dev.v2 k1 = dev.v1 spring.datasource.driver-class-name = com.mysql.jdbc.Driver spring.datasource.username = root spring.datasource.password = root raw = dev.raw.value ``` ![f40cf5a3-287c-449a-8ca9-d1624bff8774](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4167422/53616840-7371c780-3c1f-11e9-9d75-3556c1a9b528.png)
